title: Marc Maron

description:
This week, Anna and Sim sit down with the legendary Marc Maron (THE MARC MARON SHOW, GLOW). In this episode, Anna and Marc discuss high school reunions (7:00), the addiction of doing standup (18:30), answer some Deal-Breakers (42:00), and play “How Would You Proceed?” (1:00:00).

Later, they call Joey (1:06:30), who is unsure how to talk to his mother after she started dating again, and Cynthia (1:23:00), whose close friendship with a guy is causing friction with the guy’s girlfriend. Tune in!

 

Social Media:

Marc Maron: @marcmaron

Anna Faris: @annafaris

Unqualified: @unqualified


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
